Marine Security is a collection of blogposts dedicated to providing objective synopsis of maritime security issues, based on interesting and policy-relevant academic research, but tailored for general audiences. 

</br> 

### For Contributors

This platform is also open to anyone who wishes to share their research in the area of maritime security. The post should be written for general audience, in a clear and concise way, and not exceeding 1000 words. Please email your submission at <a href="mailto:marsecblog@gmail.com">marsecblog\@gmail.com</a>\.
